meaning: cavity, hole, slit, very, great, exceedingly

onyomiExamples.meaning: peafowl (incl. the male peacock, female peahen, and young peachick)

kunyomiExamples.meaning: hole, opening, perforation, pit, hollow, hole (in the ground, etc.), burrow, den, lair, holt, hole, deficit, shortage, missing person (in a team, meeting, etc.), vacancy, opening, flaw, well-kept secret place, upset victory (with a large payoff), pit (of a theater), hiding place, hideout, underbelly (of society, etc.)
